      • testFairness

        public String[] testFairness(Assignment<Lecture,Placement> assignment)
        Method for whole evaluation of fairness criteria
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        Returns:
        String[] with informations about solution [0-Avarage instructor penalty, 1-Sum of squared penalities, 2-Pmax, 3-Pdev, 4-Perror, 5-Pss, 6-Jain, 7-worst instructor fairness value,8-Instructors fairness value]
